My teen boys rode this ride on Sunday, June 14th and again on Monday, June 15th and said most people were following the social distancing markers and rules, but just like anywhere we have been there were a few not following the guidelines. I have to say on a whole that I was impressed with the parks with their cleaning, employees requesting to cover your nose if it was not covered, etc., and reminding people to keep your distance. Universal was practically empty on Monday though.
Maybe a lot of people aren't ready yet to go to a theme park? It isn't something I would do while we're still in the grip of the pandemic but each to their own!Edited: 1:07 am, June 17, 2020
